_comment: Example showing all supported formats for videos.json

videos._comment: Full override example - custom title and description
videos.title: Son of a Preacher Man
videos.description: Live at Redwood City Music In The Park, 2022

videos._comment: Partial override - only custom title, description from YouTube
videos.title: I Can't Stand The Rain

videos._comment: No overrides - all metadata from YouTube

videos._comment_alternative: You can also use simple strings if you don't need any overrides:
